author: Staff Reporter
text:
Anjetti police have registered a case against the family members of a couple who had committed suicide here in Denkanikottai.

Two members belonging to the family had cremated the bodies of the couple without informing the police.

According to the police, the deceased Madhappa (28) and his wife Rani (26) had committed suicide over a domestic dispute.

The woman had consumed poison and was found unconscious by her family members, before she was rushed to Anjetty Primary Health Center, where she was declared brought dead.

Upset over the death of his wife, Madhappa too consumed poison and died.

The family members of the couple had cremated the bodies in a forest here without informing the police.

However, the incident came to light recently.

Absconding

Based on this, the local village administrative office lodged a complaint with Anjetti police. Case was registered against two persons including the brother of Madhappa. The two men have since been absconding.
title: Couple suicide: case registered against two
